summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to gambling; amending Sections 12A.36.040, 12A.36.080, and 12A.36.100 of Ordinance 102843 (Seattle Criminal Code) to exclude from the offenses defined therein certain games and gambling activities played or conducted solely by persons defined as "players", and repealing Sections 12A.36.020 and 12A.36.060 of said ordinance.
